org.hibernate.search.annotations

Annotation Type FieldBridge


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
 @Documented
public @interface FieldBridge
    Specifies a custom field bridge implementation
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Class<?> impl
      The implementation class to instantiate.
      Parameter[] params
      Parameters to be passed to the bridge instance, if it implements ParameterizedBridge.

    • Element Detail

      • impl

        public abstract Class<?> impl
        The implementation class to instantiate.

        The given class must implement either FieldBridge or StringBridge.

        Additionally, the given class may implement more advanced interfaces, such as for instance TwoWayFieldBridge, TwoWayStringBridge, MetadataProvidingFieldBridge, IgnoreAnalyzerBridge, AppliedOnTypeAwareBridge or ParameterizedBridge.

        Default:
        void.class

      • params

        public abstract Parameter[] params
        Parameters to be passed to the bridge instance, if it implements ParameterizedBridge.
        Default:
        {}
